strings: <se_low>King Trode: You mustn't give people a fright like that, <leader>.
<se_low>King Trode: Goodness! What a scream he had on him, though!
<se_low>Yangus: They were 'uggin' each other! I caught a glimpse of 'em 'oldin' on to each other for dear life!

<se_low>Yangus: Two grown men like that 'avin' a cuddle!
Tremblin' like leaves they were, 'UGGIN'!
It was the funniest thing I've seen in ages!
<se_high>Jessica: It might have been cute...if they'd been two little boys!

<se_high>Jessica: But two grown men?
And it was just a little scare, you know?
What a pair of sissies!
<se_def>Angelo: I don't see what's so strange about two men hugging like that.

<se_def>Angelo: I mean, back at the abbey...
Er, no, never mind.
<se_high>Red: Do them two call 'emselves men, do they? Gordon Bennett! Forget monsters, a delinquent kid would rung rings around that pair!
<se_low>Morrie: Ah ha ha! You know how to pass the wind up people, ay? You are trying to make them used to the scary situazioni so they can handle the monsters next time, si?
